channel.title: Need help to fix query formatter for postgresql jsonb operators
channel.description:
Hi all,
I want to fix this issue [https://github.com/getredash/redash/issues/5644](https://github.com/getredash/redash/issues/5644), but I don't have a clear picture of how to fix it. I have done some analysis, and all that I have mentioned in the comment section but didn't get any response yet. any of your guidance will be really appreciatedðŸ™‚.
